text: I am deeply concerned that, without peace and a two-state solution, the Jewish and democratic nature of Israel is in danger. That's why I have opposed Israel's settlement policy since 1973, and that's why I have favored a two-state solution since 1967.
author: Alan Dershowitz

text: I am a peace supporting Jew.
author: Alan Dershowitz

text: Not just Christians and Jews, but also Muslims, Buddhists, Hindus and the followers of many other religions believe in values like peace, respect, tolerance and dignity. These are values that bring people together and enable us to build responsible and solid communities.
author: Alcee Hastings

text: We know more about war than we know about peace, more about killing than we know about living.
author: Omar N. Bradley

text: The more bombers, the less room for doves of peace.
author: Nikita Khrushchev
